channel.title: Noir on Let's see what happens.
channel.description: Recent content in Noir on Let's see what happens.

item.title: Wired Encounters
item.description:
I was looking for a project this summer so I had some random interactions over the internet. Two of interactions had some strange quality.

One is what I recall as short and bald guy from post-Soviet territory. He had a very attentive look as if at every moment he was looking at spinning slots. He had a gambling project and he even said that involvement in such projects is less ethically challenging than being involved in prostitution business. But then to support the claim he pulled some retro casino game box with “girl on the front cover”. He thought that the disclaimer that the casino has no age limit should support his claim.
